text: (yākūb nabi, yūsuf nabiṭa) “magē ādaraṇīya putunē! oba duṭu sihinaya obagē sahōdarayinṭa nopavasanu. (esē pævasuvahot) ovun obaṭa vipatak kirīmaṭa kumantraṇa karanu æta. mandayat niyata vaśayenma ṣeyitān minisunṭa prakaṭa satureku vaśayen siṭinnēya. (kumantraṇa karana men ovunva mohu poḷam̆bavannaṭa iḍa æta)” yayi pævasuvēya
